channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump was speaking to reporters when a camera zoomed in on the president’s hand.

item.description: President Trump had promised a "major statement" on Russia on Monday.

item.title: 7/15: The Daily Report
item.description: Nancy Chen reports on new data surrounding inflation and Russia's response to President Trump's ultimatum to end the war in Ukraine.

item.title: 2 water buffaloes kill farmer after he becomes trapped in their enclosure
item.description: A farmer in Oklahoma has been killed by two water buffaloes after becoming trapped inside their enclosure, police said.

item.title: Woman arrested for allegedly seducing, blackmailing Buddhist monks
item.description: At least nine abbots and senior monks involved in the scandal have been disrobed and cast out of the monkhood, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Hikers confront man accused of starting fire on Los Angeles trail
item.description: A group of hikers stepped in to help stop an alleged arsonist accused of starting a fire in LA's popular Runyon Canyon.
